data.lyric:
[ti:F*CK YOU, GOODBYE (Explicit)]
[ar:The Kid LAROI/Machine Gun Kelly]
[al:F*CK LOVE (SAVAGE) (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]F*CK YOU, GOODBYE (Explicit) - The Kid LAROI/Machine Gun Kelly (机关枪凯利)
[00:01.90]Lyrics by：Charlton Howard/Lukasz Gottwald/Ryan Ogren/Richard Colson Baker
[00:03.80]Composed by：Charlton Howard/Lukasz Gottwald/Ryan Ogren/Richard Colson Baker
[00:05.71]The Kid LAROI：
[00:06.28]F**k you goodbye
[00:08.75]You hurt me for the last time
[00:11.42]It's time for me to move on
[00:13.96]So f**k you and goodbye
[00:16.75]I gave you love and I hate it
[00:18.42]Yeah yeah
[00:19.18]Yeah all of the time that I wasted
[00:21.32]Yeah yeah
[00:21.88]F**k you goodbye
[00:24.32]You hurt me for the last time
[00:26.87]It's the last time I let you hurt me
[00:29.36]F**k you goodbye I did not deserve it
[00:31.86]None of this bulls**t was ever really worth it
[00:34.53]You blame me like I know I ain't perfect
[00:37.15]I tried with you and I lied for you
[00:39.82]Many times put my life on the line for you
[00:42.22]I really wanted to get it right with you
[00:44.89]I always saw the better side of you
[00:47.20]And now it's f**k you for life
[00:48.18]I'm doin' better you right
[00:49.51]I was wrong 'bout you I guess I finally realized
[00:52.05]You brought the dark to my light
[00:53.29]I'm with a new one tonight
[00:54.66]But there is one last thing I want to tell you tonight
[00:58.43]F**k you goodbye
[01:00.85]You hurt me for the last time
[01:03.42]It's time for me to move on
[01:05.98]So f**k you and goodbye
[01:08.85]I gave you love and I hate it
[01:10.96]Yeah yeah
[01:11.38]Yeah all of the time that I wasted
[01:13.16]Yeah yeah
[01:14.05]F**k you goodbye
[01:16.52]You hurt me for the last time
[01:18.70]Machine Gun Kelly：
[01:19.11]Wait that was a lie
[01:20.23]Because I cannot erase you like eternal sunshine in a spotless mind
[01:24.48]Red in the eyes lately I've been on a c*****e diet
[01:27.45]I've been tryin' to feed my high
[01:29.74]Your things are still in the box that you left in the bedroom
[01:34.93]You'll leave and I'm here
[01:37.00]With no heart guess I'll be dead soon
[01:39.59]Ghost in a shell stone like a cemetery
[01:42.12]Scars don't heal I got these in February
[01:44.74]Broke your spell love is only temporary
[01:47.28]Highway to hell I'm hangin' out the roof yellin'
[01:50.05]Both：
[01:50.78]F**k you goodbye
[01:52.59]Yeah
[01:53.11]You hurt me for the last time
[01:55.63]It's time for me to move on
[01:58.19]So f**k you and goodbye
[02:00.98]I gave you love and I hate it
[02:02.93]Yeah yeah
[02:03.52]Yeah all of the time that I wasted
[02:05.35]Yeah yeah
[02:06.22]F**k you goodbye
[02:08.69]You hurt me for the last time
data.trans:
[ti:F*CK YOU, GOODBYE (Explicit)]
[ar:The Kid LAROI/Machine Gun Kelly]
[al:F*CK LOVE (SAVAGE) (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.90]//
[00:03.80]//
[00:05.71]//
[00:06.28]去你的 再见
[00:08.75]这是你最后一次伤害我
[00:11.42]我该向前看了
[00:13.96]所以 去你的 再见
[00:16.75]我爱过你 我很后悔
[00:18.42]//
[00:19.18]浪费了那么多时间
[00:21.32]//
[00:21.88]去你的 再见
[00:24.32]这是你最后一次伤害我
[00:26.87]这是我最后一次让你伤害我
[00:29.36]去你的 再见 我不该被这样对待
[00:31.86]这一切根本就不值得
[00:34.53]你责备我 就好像我知道我不完美
[00:37.15]我努力迎合你 我为你撒谎
[00:39.82]多少次 为你赌上我的性命
[00:42.22]我真的想要和你好好过
[00:44.89]我总是看到你好的地方
[00:47.20]而现在 我们这一辈子就别见了吧
[00:48.18]我现在过得更好 你说得对
[00:49.51]我看错了你 看来我终于明白了
[00:52.05]你让我的世界失去了光明
[00:53.29]今夜我和新欢在一起
[00:54.66]但今夜我想和你说最后一件事
[00:58.43]去你的 再见
[01:00.85]这是你最后一次伤害我
[01:03.42]我该向前看了
[01:05.98]所以 去你的 再见
[01:08.85]我爱过你 我很后悔
[01:10.96]//
[01:11.38]浪费了那么多时间
[01:13.16]//
[01:14.05]去你的 再见
[01:16.52]这是你最后一次伤害我
[01:18.70]//
[01:19.11]等等 那是假的
[01:20.23]因为我没法把你抹去 就像洒在一尘不染的心上那永恒的阳光
[01:24.48]眼睛充满血丝 最近我沉迷于那种东西
[01:27.45]我想要让自己保持兴奋
[01:29.74]你的东西依然放在我卧室的盒子里
[01:34.93]你会离去 而我待在原地
[01:37.00]无精打采 感觉我就要死了
[01:39.59]就像行尸走肉 行将躺进坟墓
[01:42.12]无法修复的伤疤 从二月就存在
[01:44.74]打破你的魔咒 爱都是暂时的
[01:47.28]开车飞驰在通往地狱的路上 我探出车顶 大声叫
[01:50.05]//
[01:50.78]去你的 再见
[01:52.59]//
[01:53.11]这是你最后一次伤害我
[01:55.63]我该向前看了
[01:58.19]所以 去你的 再见
[02:00.98]我爱过你 我很后悔
[02:02.93]//
[02:03.52]浪费了那么多时间
[02:05.35]//
[02:06.22]去你的 再见
[02:08.69]这是你最后一次伤害我
